name: Vintage Style Fascinator Art Deco Style 1920's1940's Hollywood Glamour Pin up
description:
Vintage Hollywood Glamour Pinup style Fascinator in the form of a art deco shell.
Made entirely by hand in our studio using our own hat block this sculpted shell design is made from pink wool felt and lined with silk.
For a touch of real Hollywood glamour this stunning headpiece is embellished with vintage shell sequins and beads,trimmed with feathers and spotted bird cage veiling.
At the top of the shell has a felt bow with pearl detail.
This vintage style fascinator is available in other colour ways and trims could be worn at vintage themed wedding,vintage events such as goodwood,twinwood or a day a the races.
Safely secured with a milliners metal hair slide concealed inside the fascinator.We also have added extra loops for bobby pins or grips.

Should you wish to have a design custom made for your wedding please get in touch to discuss your requirements.We would love to hear from you.

Size measures Width 6" or 15cm Height 5" or 12cm

At the top of the shell has a ribbon with diamente and pearl detail.

name: Valentine Heart and Love Bird Leather Necklace Pink Blossom
description:
Lulabop's unique sculpted leather fashion jewelry is designed and handmade in England 
by Zak & Lula Smith.


This stunning leather necklace designed for our Love in Paris Collection 2013.
Two pink leather lovebirds surround a silver leather heart which we have trimmed with lace,velvet flowers,vintage crystals and silver beads.
This romantic jewelry could be a gift for valentines day or for a bride to wear on her wedding day.
We can make matching hair accessories, shoe clips or add to the flowers in your bouquet.


16" quality dark brass fine chain.

Lined in ivory 100% wool felt so very comfortable to wear.

Made from quality glove leather.

Chain fixings and fastenings are all dark brass and from the vintaj range of natural brass.
Nickel free.

Length of chain is.41cm,16"


To arrange private commissions using brides chosen themes or colors please contact us for more details.

Zak & Lula x

name: Hand Made Gold Leather IPhone Cover with Lulabop bluebird design
description:
This leather Iphone  cover is hand made by ourselves from Italian quality soft leather in metallic gold and lined with 100% black wool felt.
This gives a nice snug fit and gives soft protection inside.
This beautiful soft leather cover/case is embossed with our own unique Lulabop Bluebird design.
Other colours leathers are available and it also comes in vintage snakeskin with tan leather on reverse side.
This phone will also fit samsung,but please check your phone measurements with ours.
Case measures 7.5cm x 12.5cm
We will be happy to make a custom size for other phones.

name: Blue Birds and Heart Rockabilly Style Leather Necklace
description:
Lulabop's unique sculpted leather fashion jewelry is designed and 
handmade in England by Zak Smith.

This stunning necklace is inspired by tattoo designs of the 50's and is one of Zak's latest designs for this collection.

Created from Sky Blue and Lipstick Red soft leather and lined with black felt.
This tattoo style bluebird lovers necklace hangs on 16" quality dark brass etched chain.
A statement necklace which will turn heads were ever you go!

Lined in black 100% wool felt so very comfortable to wear.
Made from quality glove leather.
Chain fixings and fastenings are all dark brass and from the vintaj range of natural brass.
Nickel free.
Length of chain is.41cm,16"


This is another one of our leather blue bird designs...yes we love them,but this time two birds together with a red heart and gold ribbon sash on a heavy engraved chain.
This necklace is inspired by a vintage sailors tattoo and would make a perfect gift for valentines.hint hint...

This stunning necklace is inspired by tattoo designs of the 50's and is one of Zak's latest designs for this collection.

Created from gold metallic vintage leather which is scuffed to give a vintage aged look.
This tattoo heart and wings necklace hangs on 16" quality dark brass etched chain.
A statement necklace which will turn heads were ever you go!

Lined in black 100% wool felt so very comfortable to wear.
Made from quality leather in a beautiful warm gold and distressed to give a vintage appearance.
Chain fixings and fastenings are all dark brass and from the vintaj range of natural brass.Nickel free.

This stunning statement necklace really shines out and looks great with biker jackets,jean jackets or a little black dress.
Also available in Lipstick Red or Jet Black.

name: Black Leather & Gold Leaf Bluebird Broach
description:
This beautiful handmade blue bird broach pin is created from finest quality black leather and backed in black wool felt .We have finished this stunning bluebird wings with real gold leaf.
These over sized bluebird broaches always get lots of compliments.

Lulabop's unique sculpted leather fashion jewelry is handmade in England by Zak Smith.
Can be worn on your lapel of your jacket ,blouse or why not pin to your best 50's dress. 

Measures 7cm .Silver plated broach back pin.
Available in other colours: Lipstick Red, Blue,Oh'boy Orange,Gold,Silver.
visit us on facebook.

name: Gold Leather Blue bird/Swallow Broach
description:
Gold Leather blue bird /Swallow broach pin is created from Italian gold leather
and backed in wool felt.
The gold leather retro Blue blue or Swallow broach has been aged in places to give a vintage finish.

Lulabop is a small indie fashion accessories label making unique sculpted leather fashion jewelry and accessories we lovingly make every piece by hand in our studio in Winchester England.

Our Bird Broaches can be worn on your lapel of your jacket ,blouse or why not pin to your best 50's dress. 

Measures 7cm .Silver plated broach back pin.
Available in other colours: Ivory, Lipstick Red,Sky Blue,Vintage Silver,Vintage Gold.

name: Black Leather Fashion Cuff with Bluebird design.
description:

Lulabop's unique sculpted leather fashion jewelry is handmade in England.
Lined in cream wool felt so very comfortable to wear.
Fastens with two vintage black and gold buttons.
Measurements.7cm,3" high.
Wrist measurement. 20cm,7.5"

name: Ivory Wedding Fascinator hat with Leather Blue Bird.
description:
This stunning wedding fascinator/ hat is set on a ivory sinamay base with vintage bobble lace trim,spotted ivory veiling and trimmed with one of our unique leather bluebirds in ivory which has been embellished diamente.
Making this a truly unique hairpiece to wear for your special day.

Safely secured with a hairslide concealed inside the fascinator.
We welcome private commissions so please get in touch if you would like to discuss your requirements.

name: Royal Blue Bird Fascinator Hat
description:
This stunning Blue Bird Fascinator is set on a royal blue straw base trimmed with merry widow spotted veiling in navy blue.Finished with one of our leather bluebirds and embellished with a vintage navy ostrich feather.
Perfect for weddings,ascot races,cocktails or vintage event.
Safely secured with a hairslide concealed inside the fascinator.
We welcome private commissions so please get in touch if you would like to discuss your requirements.
